actions.text: Read twice and referred jointly to the Committees on Budget; Governmental Affairs pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977, as modified by the order of April 11, 1986, with instructions that if one Committee reports, the other Committee have thirty days to report or be discharged.

official_title: A bill to amend the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 to ensure the continued enforcement of the pay-as-you-go budget requirement until such time as the budget is balanced in order to protect the social security trust funds, the Federal military retiree trust fund, the highway trust funds, the medicare trust fund, the civil service retirement trust fund, the unemployment trust fund, and the airports trust fund.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Pay-as-you-go Extension Act - Amends the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 (Gramm-Rudman-Hollings Act) to provide that pay-as-you-go requirements shall be effective until the Federal budget, excluding the receipts and disbursements of the social security trust funds and any other Federal trust fund included in the gross Federal debt, is in balance or surplus.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 to ensure the continued enforcement of the pay-as-you-go budget requirement until such time as the budget is balanced in order to protect the social security trust funds, the Federal military retiree trust fund, the highway trust funds, the medicare trust fund, the civil service retirement trust fund, the unemployment trust fund, and the airports trust fund.
